completion.item: Notifies all selection listeners about the selection change

Selects a Range of items. From shiftItem to the passed item.
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TableItem) item - the item

Adds a selection listener on the table
Parameters: (gara.jswt.SelectionListener) listener - the desired listener to be added to this table
Throws: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener

Deselects a specific item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TreeItem) item - the item to deselect

Looks for the index of a specified item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TableItem) item - the item for the index
Throws: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this table TypeError - if the item is not a TableItem
Returns: the index of the specified item

Removes a selection listener from this table
Parameters: (gara.jswt.SelectionListener) listener - the listener to be removed from this table
Throws: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener

Selects an item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TableItem) item - the item that should be selected
Throws: TypeError - if the item is not a TableItem
